00027 #ifndef __TYPES_UI_H
00028 #define __TYPES_UI_H
00029 
00030 typedef unsigned char uint8;
00031 typedef signed char sint8;
00032 typedef unsigned short uint16;
00033 typedef signed short sint16;
00034 typedef unsigned int uint32;
00035 typedef signed int sint32;
00036 
00037 typedef int RD_BOOL;
00038 typedef void *RD_HBITMAP;
00039 typedef void *RD_HGLYPH;
00040 typedef void *RD_HCOLOURMAP;
00041 typedef void *RD_HCURSOR;

00043 typedef struct _RD_POINT
00044 {
00045         sint16 x, y;
00046 }
00047 RD_POINT;
00048 
00049 typedef struct _RD_COLOURENTRY
00050 {
00051         uint8 red;
00052         uint8 green;
00053         uint8 blue;
00054 }
00055 RD_COLOURENTRY;
00056 
00057 typedef struct _RD_COLOURMAP
00058 {
00059         uint16 ncolours;
00060         RD_COLOURENTRY *colours;
00061 }
00062 RD_COLOURMAP;
00063 
00064 typedef struct _RD_PEN
00065 {
00066         uint8 style;
00067         uint8 width;
00068         uint32 colour;
00069 }
00070 RD_PEN;
00071 
00072 /* this is whats in the brush cache */
00073 typedef struct _RD_BRUSHDATA
00074 {
00075         uint32 colour_code;
00076         uint32 data_size;
00077         uint8 *data;
00078 }
00079 RD_BRUSHDATA;
00080 
00081 typedef struct _RD_BRUSH
00082 {
00083         uint8 xorigin;
00084         uint8 yorigin;
00085         uint8 style;
00086         uint8 pattern[8];
00087         RD_BRUSHDATA *bd;
00088 }
00089 RD_BRUSH;
